Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
On Friday of last week (17th January), samples and an order form for 'School Photographs' were sent home with your child.
Please be reminded that Thursday this week (23rd January) is the deadline for ordering School Photographs. After this date, orders will not be received in school.
If you did not receive an order form, please call the school reception desk directly.
Kind regards,
Administration Team
The British School of Guangzhou
